message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper proposes a new framework for adversarial certification with non-Gaussian noise and for more general types of attacks, from a unified functional optimization perspective. The paper focuses on deep learning and improving the robustness of classifiers against adversarial attacks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the security of deep learning models, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The proposed framework involves image classification, which is a common application of computer vision, and thus the paper may also belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision). The paper proposes a new approach to designing smoothing distributions, which involves optimization, and thus the paper may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
